The Quranic researcher is a day, that is, on the day, as we have the right to the lying of the verses of God, and his prophets are upon them, peace be upon them, and there is no confusion for the first one, for the first For the torment of the world.It was said: Do not reflect on the disagreement of the attachment of the lies in the two people that it is attached to here what you heard, and when it is presented on the day of the chapter, and the day is so The union’s convergence, and the affirmation is a good matter in which we have not been lost from the water that is insulting water from a dirty sperm, and there is no way in it, and there is no way in it.A place that is ancient, is the mercy to a known amount of knowledge, which is known to God.That is, we appreciate that appreciation for that, so we are the blessings of the Qadir, that is, we are the best of those who are destined.It is permissible for the meaning to be, so we are able to do so, so we will be able to do so that we are the first and the first to the first to the righteousness of God.With strictness and his saying of the exalted from a sperm that he created, and he appreciated it [Abbas: 19] and his saying of his grace to a known destiny, and he increased his absence, that he will be disappointed.It is intended for itself, so it was said: We appreciated that estimated, that is, an estimated estimation indicating the fullness of the ability and the amount of mercy on the hadeeth of the capacity of the Almighty.Did we not create you and say that the good is to prevail in the second one, because the words are with the denial, there is no face for it, as no one is denied, and this is the one who is able to do this Decide on it by saying, “Did you not create you, and take care of it..
